com.mpos.lottery.te.gameimpl.instantgame.domain.logic

接口 ValidationStrategy

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractValidationStrategy, EGameValidationStrategy, ValidationStrategyProxy, VIRNValidationStrategy

    public interface ValidationStrategy

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PrizeLevelDto validate(InstantTicket ticket, java.lang.String virn, boolean isEnquiry)
      Confirm if a instant ticket win a prize.

    • 方法详细资料

      • validate

        PrizeLevelDto validate(InstantTicket ticket,
                     java.lang.String virn,
                     boolean isEnquiry)
                       throws ApplicationException
        Confirm if a instant ticket win a prize. Different implementation can support different algorithm.
        参数:
        ticket - The instant ticket retrieved from the backend.
        virn - The virn of ticket.
        isEnquiry - Whether this transaction is enquriy(read-only)?
        返回:
        a InstantPayoutDto instance if win a prize, or null will be returned.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.
